price: Yɛammͻ ne mmienu wͻ (agorͻ so) na mmom nokorε nti, nanso wͻn mu pii nnim.
arabic: مَا خَلَقۡنَٰهُمَآ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: mā khalaqnāhumā illā bil-ḥaqi walākinna aktharahum lā yaʿlamūna
